headline: Introducing Pin & Tumbler™ A Studio by Schlage, the Brand's First Innovation Studio, Blending Elevated Design and Innovation
summary: Schlage, a trusted leader in door hardware for over a century, is proud to introduce its new design and innovation studio, Pin & Tumbler™ A Studio by Schlage. Offering exclusive, limited-release solutions direct to consumers through Schlage.com and driving thought leadership collaborations, the studio will accelerate innovation in residential access solutions with a focus on style, technology, ease and convenience.

thumbnail.caption: The Bold Mosaic Trim Collection exudes confidence and character with vibrant colors and statement patterns.
